summary.span: 表示对象的简单后进先出 (LIFO) 非泛型集合。

span.span: Represents a simple last-in-first-out (LIFO) non-generic collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，会根据需要通过重新分配来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 建议不要将 `Stack` 类用于新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `Stack` class for new development. 相反，我们建议使用泛型 类。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 GitHub 上[不应使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md)。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. 如果 小于堆栈的容量，则 是 `O(1)` 操作。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an `O(1)` operation. 如果需要增加容量以容纳新元素，则 成为 `O(n)` 操作，`n` 。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . 是 `O(1)` 操作。 is an `O(1)` operation. 接受 `null` 作为有效值，并允许重复元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建值并将其添加到堆栈中，以及如何显示其值。The following example shows how to create and add values to a Stack and how to display its values. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型的公共静态（ Visual Basic）成员是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 若要保证 的线程安全，必须通过 方法返回的包装完成所有操作。

span.span: To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量就无需在将元素添加到 时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This constructor is an `O(1)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量就无需在将元素添加到 时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 按照 的 读取元素的顺序将这些元素复制到 。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the of the . 此构造函数是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `col`中的元素数目。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `col`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量就无需在将元素添加到 时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `initialCapacity`的。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is `initialCapacity`.

span.span: Creates a shallow copy of the .
A shallow copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合的浅表副本仅复制集合的元素，无论它们是引用类型还是值类型，但不复制引用引用的对象。A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. 新集合中的引用指向原始集合中的引用所指向的相同对象。The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to. 与此相反，集合的深层副本会复制元素以及元素直接或间接引用的所有内容。In contrast, a deep copy of a collection copies the elements and everything directly or indirectly referenced by the elements. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过调用 方法来确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling the method. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . 从 .NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法通过将 `obj` 参数传递给集合中各个对象的 方法来测试是否相等。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method tests for equality by passing the `obj` argument to the method of individual objects in the collection. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，通过将集合中的各个项传递到 `obj` 参数的 方法来做出此决定。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using passing the individual items in the collection to the method of the `obj` argument.

[!code-cpp[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是 可以存储的元素数。The capacity is the number of elements that the can store. 是实际处于 中的元素的数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量始终大于或等于 。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果在添加元素时 超过容量，则会自动重新分配内部数组，然后再复制旧元素并添加新元素，从而自动增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

span.span: Returns an for the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic， C# ][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位到集合中的最后一个元素之后， 返回 `false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则 未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举器就仍有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（确保线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要保证 的线程安全，必须通过 方法返回的包装完成所有操作。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through the wrapper returned by the method. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同步 、确定 是否同步以及使用同步 。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在 的顶部插入一个对象。

span.span: Inserts an object at the top of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 已经等于容量 ，则会自动重新分配内部数组，并将现有元素复制到新数组，然后再添加新元素。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果需要，可以将 `null` 推送到 作为占位符。`null` can be pushed onto the as a placeholder, if needed. 它占据堆栈中的一个槽，并将其视为任何对象。It occupies a slot in the stack and is treated like any object. 如果 小于堆栈的容量，则 是 `O(1)` 操作。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an `O(1)` operation. 如果需要增加容量以容纳新元素，则 成为 `O(n)` 操作，`n` 。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将元素添加到 、从 中删除元素或在 顶部查看元素。The following example shows how to add elements to the , remove elements from the , or view the element at the top of the . [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.Peek Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.Peek Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.Peek Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.Peek Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.Peek Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.Peek Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Stack Synchronized(class System.Collections.Stack stack) cil managed
Public Shared Function Synchronized (stack As Stack) As Stack

span.span: The to synchronize.

summary.span: 返回 的同步（线程安全）包装。

span.span: Returns a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for the .
A synchronized wrapper around the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了保证 的线程安全，所有操作都必须通过此包装器完成。To guarantee the thread safety of the , all operations must be done through this wrapper. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何同步 、确定 是否同步以及使用同步 。The following example shows how to synchronize a , determine if a is synchronized, and use a synchronized . [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 一个可用于同步对 的访问的 。

span.span: An that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 的同步版本，请使用 方法。To create a synchronized version of the , use the method. 但是，派生类可以使用 属性提供其自己的 的同步版本。However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须对 的 执行操作，而不是直接在 上执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改 对象的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.IsSynchronized Example/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

summary.span: 将 复制到新数组中。

span.span: Copies the to a new array.

returns.span: 新数组，包含 的元素的副本。

span.span: A new array containing copies of the elements of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元素将按后进先出（LIFO）顺序复制到数组，类似于对 的连续调用返回的元素的顺序。The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to . 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 复制到一维数组中。The following example shows how to copy a into a one-dimensional array. [!code-cpp[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Stack.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Stack.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
